We operate our own central roastery from which we distribute right to the shops. This allows you to experience every cup as if you were right at the very farm it originates from. To achieve this, we use a refurbished 1920s Probat coffee roaster.

We know that roasting is something you have to keep on perfecting constantly. Each coffee has requires a different roast to get the aroma and tastes just right. That’s why our experts fine tune the way we roast coffees every day. It’s a constant effort.
